Day 4 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Seeing the Hubbard Glacier ( Don't forget to click on a picture to see a larger version of it)

We came within 1.1 miles of the glacier- fairly close for a large ship
Dark glacier to left is the Valerie Glacier which colided with the Hubbard Glacier in 1986
The Tlingit indians believe a dark glacier is a female glacier as 'she' paints her face in public

Other scenes around the bay as the ship turns for all to see

Moved from the public deck to our veranda to see the sights.


Obie enjoying their veranda
